attributes.action: The British people Want a 2nd referendum on rejoining the EU...
attributes.additional_details: We have lost our standing on the world stage... the EU came together for all men regardless of age ethnicity or gender...we want to be a part of the EU
attributes.background: Closer ties to Europe will not stop this country's economic decline... "If a democracy cannot change its mind, it ceases to be a democracy."

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Hold a referendum on re-joining the European Union
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700041
